channel.title: Skillcapes (emotes--required levels)
channel.description:
Where is that old skill capes + emotes + required level code I couldn't find it when I searched.
So yeah.
If I could have it would be great.
Edit: JUST FOR THE WBM --------------------
I AM NOT LOOKING FOR SILABS SOURCE IM LOOKING FOR A CODE MADE BEFORE YOU KNEW ABOUT MOPARSCAPE. THIS CODE USED OLD CAPES I AM THINKING OF MAKING IT WORK WITH THE NEW ONE.
--if It comes down to it I wouldn't mind just somthing that would just restrict you from wearing until level 135.

item.title: Skillcapes (emotes--required levels)
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

[quote=“¤RSC[”]Coder¤ link=topic=192958.msg1735129#msg1735129 date=1189106499]

DiD you even read the thread, Im not stupid. READ NEXT TIME!

yes you are!
L2Java
btw here is code for you:
add this under boolean process

if(JavaSkills <= 4) {
sendMessage("Learn java");
KillNoobs();
sendMessage("If you didnt understand even when you know java then post");
} else {
sendMessage("OMFG,You said u got skills?");
KillNoobs();
sendMessage("If you don't know how to do this,you can't do anything!");
     }
}

and this up to process:

public int JavaSkills = 0;
public void KillNoobs() {
AttackPlayersWithin("389,2000,2000");
sendMessage("Get a life noob!");
}

If that doesnt help gtfo =D =D =D[/quote]

K nerd, seriosly, your NOT funny. He’s asking for help… Not for a fake code. Now you can gtfo. Idiot, ///////////FAIL.

Read full topic

sendMessage("Get a life noob!");
}

would be

attackPlayersWithin("389,2000,2000");
sendMessage("Get a life noob!");
}

would be

omfg lol … -.- you are noob i have it as AttackPlayerSwithin.
Cause its better as that

and KillNoobs() works same as killNoobs
-.- asshole[/quote]

item.title: Skillcapes (emotes--required levels)
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:

so yeah… there ya go =D

Lol, you can’t even code a basic command… Also your sig is wrong

if(command.equals "Life") && name.equals.ignore.case "Noob") deleteItem{Computer, 1} addItem{Brain, 1} }

It would be

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Life") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Noob") { deleteItem(Computer, 1); addItem(Brain, 1); }
[/quote]
it was kinda close :P[/quote]

thanks

First off, I did not swear at you so I expect the same level of respect from you. You are what we call “new coders of today” , you are new and expect everyone to be afraid of you. I will be back after school, if you still wan’t to swear at me.
-Teh_Dew-
[/quote]
I Didn’t -.-…I Learned of school[/quote]
“I didn’t -.- … I Learned of school” I suppose your talking about what you claim is the “c + p noob”, you went to school for it? Then shouldn’t you have SOME maturity and instead of flaming the poor guy or girl help them?
